title: Links
content: How do i get rid of the full link at the bottom of the page when i hover over an image?
creator: rayyanspare3

title: Microsoft Edge Webviewer appeared on my PC and is now slowing it down, how do I get rid of it?
content: Hi. I recently noticed my PC was running very slowly on start up and when I opened Task manager I noticed a load of processes from Microsoft Edge Web Viewer 2 (which I have NOT installed). Also i can't get rid of them. What are MS playing at - I find it insidious, please help fix this. I am not too technical, thanks.
creator: kking9914

title: Did a clean install, bookmarks gone
content:
To resolve an issue that has been plaguing me, I did a clean install of Firefox. I followed some instructions I found on here that ensured that all I had to do was rename the existing Firefox folder to something else, download and run the installer again, and I should have done a clean install without losing my user data.

The issue I had has been fixed, but all of my add-ons and bookmarks are gone. I can get the add-ons back, but where can I find the bookmarks in the old Firefox folder?
creator: TheNobleShade

title: Drag tab to bookmark folder timeout
content: I see this question was raised back in 2019, but the solution didn't really solve the issue very cleanly. Wanted to check and see if any new options have become available since then. My preferred method of bookmarking new pages is to drag them into nested folders for ease of organization and finding them later. However, the bookmark menus are extremely sensitive to cursor placement and close VERY quickly if you accidentally go outside the boundaries. Is there a way to slow that down so it's less fussy? Thank you. Running Windows 10 and FF 114.0.1 64 bit.
creator: jehully33

title: ¡Meta Business Issue!
content:
Meta Business Issue

With the most recent update when entering the Facebook ads manager (including browsing with troubleshooting mode) it happens that the interface of this platform to schedule ads does not load.

This before the update worked perfectly and therefore; notified them.

  • I had to do it using Google Chrome.
  • The yellow highlighted areas are where the interface should appear.
creator: Estepario

title: Edit a .htm file in notepad
content: When displaying a .htm file In Windows XP using Internet Explorer, I can do FILE / EDIT WITH NOTEPAD, to edit the page. How can I do this in Firefox ?

title: Firefox bookmarks, I'm out of my depth
content:
Hello

(Firefox, Win10, desktop, latest built)

Unfortunately, I'm not an expert, so, when I found something relevant, online, it was way out of my league.

I've just realised there's something wrong with the bookmarks.

Sometimes I cannot save bookmarks. Sometimes I can.

When I move bookmarks, they seem to disappear.

I delete a few bookmarks, but those bookmarks remain there as if nothing has happened.

I tried to rename a couple of bookmarks, but nothing happens, and I cannot remove such bookmarks.

I've scanned my computer for malware, viruses, etc, but everything seems ok.

I'm not sure what is happening

Cheers

Christian
creator: vvld-ml-2020

title: How to backup Firefox on Windows 10 manually?
content:
Greetings everyone,

This is a incredibly important problem for me so I thought it deserves a new thread.

It seems like there are so many things that could go wrong.

I just want to make sure that when I do the backup that I actually do it correctly because I’m finding myself relying on Firefox more and more during my everyday life.

Thank you for any help!
creator: hsma4099
